name: Reticent Media
tagline: Enlightened Agile Development Tailored To You
description:
Reticent Media is a highly skilled team of technology professionals and subject-matter experts with experience across a wide-range of industries in domestic and international markets.
Our mission is to be your go-to team for software development, advanced prototypes, and complex technology projects. Whether your project is starting on the ground floor or is an existing effort at risk of failing, we deliver the highest level of professional development and quality software using Agile methodologies and client immersion processes.
Service Offerings:
Software design & development for enterprise, web & mobile solutions
Development operations and continuous integration
Production, deployment, maintenance, support and sustainment
Engineering and business consulting
Staff augmentation and resource supplementation
Project rescue and sunk cost mitigation
